# Change the terms and conditions of a subscription

This topic explains how to amend the terms and conditions of a subscription by selecting the subscription, entering amendment details, and saving the changes.

To change the terms and conditions of a subscription:

1.  Select the subscription you want to renew.
2.  Click Amendment .

    ![terms](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/e5dc7477-9468-48ad-b4b3-70821927648f?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..34ZyprfZ79IxXteKEmPUnSGIREqVcRQHLYICEv4vnIs)

3.  Enter an Amendment Name . Optionally, enter a Change Description .
4.  Select Terms and Conditions from the Amendment Type list, then click Save .

    ![terms 2](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/4497c783-9d22-452f-baba-a08f4c8cccf3?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..YSCanJNEyAzWqlDpFwIM1oIrmZwmR3UXg3_wyN6-Beg)

5.  In the New Value section, edit the terms and conditions, then click Save
6.  Click Contract effective . Enter a Contract effective Date , then click Save .
7.  If you have Service Activation and Customer Acceptance dates enabled:
    1.  Click Service Activation and enter the Service Activation Date
    2.  Click Save .
    3.  Click Customer Acceptance and enter the Customer Acceptance Date .
    4.  Click Save .
